controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    This is the main controller class where all data from the view gets inputted and is then manipulated accordingly. Here is where we check what type of person logs in and based on that gives them access to certain features.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tom Biscardi

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.Object args)
        Since this class extends Observer, we can override the implemented method update. This method checks whether the data passed from the NotifyObserver method is valid and then calls the private method doButtonFunction to change views and manipulate data based on preceding info.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
        Parameters:
        args -
        postcondition
        Based on the button pressed, an action will be performed
        precondition
        The data notified by this Observer is an enum in the class GlobalVariables

      • doButtonFunction

        private void doButtonFunction(GlobalVariables.Events event)
        Based on the event enum that was passed, the application will continue to simulate actions accordingly
        Parameters:
        event -
        postcondition
        an action on the GUI part and the database is performed
        precondition
        data passed is an enum

      • editCourseSequence

        private void editCourseSequence()
        Edit Courses sequence changes the grade of the class selected.
        postcondition
        Course's grade was modified
        precondition
        Course was selected from SAIN report

      • removeCourseSequence

        private void removeCourseSequence()
        Remove Course Sequence Deletes the selected Course from the Student.
        postcondition
        Course was deleted from Student
        precondition
        Course was selected from SAIN Report

      • changeMajorSequence

        private void changeMajorSequence()
        Change Major Sequence that changes the major of the searched Student to what was selected in the ComboBox
        postcondition
        major of student was changed
        precondition
        a major was selected

      • addCourseSeq

        private void addCourseSeq()
        Add Course Sequence that adds any course to the Student's SAIN Report.
        postcondition
        Course is added and placed in the right spot(s) on the SAIN Report.
        precondition
        Course is entered properly

      • generateEditableSAINReport

        private void generateEditableSAINReport(Student s)
        Generates the editable SAIN Report that only admins may access.
        Parameters:
        s -
        postcondition
        Editable SAIN Report for Student s is generated
        precondition
        student s is searched and p is of type 2 (admin)

      • generateSain

        private void generateSain(Student s)
        Generates the SAIN Report that both Students and Faculty may access. This contains data that is only viewable.
        Parameters:
        s -
        postcondition
        Generates SAIN Report page that is only viewable data
        precondition
        Student entered was valid and database was accessible

      • loginSequence

        private void loginSequence()
        Sequence activated while user tries to log in. Here the data entered by the user is verified with the database containing users and will allow the appropriate access depending on the account logging in.
        postcondition
        Based on the type of account logging in, the global variable Person p will be set to the person entered and different access will be granted.
        precondition
        Database is accessible and data entered verifies with the database

      • sainReportSequence

        private void sainReportSequence()
        When SAIN Report button is pressed, this method directs where the user is sent and the view will change accordingly
        postcondition
        For a Student, their SAIN report is viewable; for a Faculty and Admin, a different view will show asking the user to search for a Student by their ID
        precondition
        Person p has a valid type

      • whatIfSequence

        private void whatIfSequence()
        Generates different What-If Analysis based on if the user is a student, or a faculty or admin. There they will be asked to input the major desired. Faculty and Admin must also input a Student ID to search.
        postcondition
        A new View will be shown asking the user for the desired major.
        precondition
        Person p has a valid type

      • doWhatIf

        private void doWhatIf()
        Takes in the data from the major selecting view class and generates a SAIN Report for a Student but with data changed so that their major is what the user input. Note: this is only temporary and does not change the Student's actual major for any users.
        postcondition
        A viewable only SAIN Report is generated based on the Student and major entered
        precondition
        Valid data was entered in all fields and Person p has a valid type

      • searchStudentSequence

        private void searchStudentSequence()
        The data entered in the FindStudentView is verified and based on the type of Person p, a different SAIN Report will be generated depending on the Student inputted.
        postcondition
        A SAIN Report will be generated based on the data up until now
        precondition
        Valid data was entered, Database was accessible and Student can be found

      • backButtonSequence

        private void backButtonSequence()
        When the back button on any screen has been pressed, depending on the screen currently on, the user will be redirected. If on the home screen the user will log out, on any other screen the user will be sent to the home screen.
        postcondition
        User will either be logged out or sent to the home page depending on the page they are currently on
        precondition
        The user is on a valid view page
